product_name: Manduka Mat Renew Yoga Mat Wash
long_description: Keep your yoga mat (sold separately) clean and smelling fresh with Manduka Mat Renew(R) yoga mat wash. Certified-organic cleaning solution with essential oils disinfects your mat and keeps it smelling fresh. Spray approximately 20 pumps directly onto the mat; wipe down mat with a damp cloth and air dry before rolling and using. Manduka Mat Renew(R) yoga mat wash is phosphate free and biodegradable; does not contain alcohol or any other drying ingredient that will degrade your yoga mat. Energizing Gingergrass scent contains geranium rose, clary sage and gingergrass essential oils.
short_description: Keep your yoga mat (sold separately) clean and smelling fresh with Manduka Mat Renew(R) yoga mat wash.
